Posts.Content: mybodymydecision wrote: I'm new to this but I have Grade 3 breast cancer they call it a triple negative it is a hard to treat cancer (stubborn) they say.  I had two surgery's to remove the lump but they are unable to get the cancer doing a mastectomy now.   I am planning to do reconstruction at the same time.  My nurse says it is very painful.  Anyone out there have any advise.   Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Reconstruction with mastectomy mybodymydecision nora_az
